body: The Item is just the essence reaver passive copy/pasted onto the spear of shojin and ACTUALLY NOT HAVING THE PASSIVE SPEAR OF SHOJIN USED TO HAVE. Why is the NEW ITEM not getting the NEW PASSIVE and instead being a recycle bin for a passive that was cool on an item but now would make essence reaver unbalanced because essence reaver is becoming a viable option now. You could just change the passive a little bit and still have it on essence reaver instead of BRICKING the new item that looked like it would be really cool utility for melee champions. I was really looking forward to the NEW item to play with pyke or riven but now the item doesn't seem that useful especially since the returning crit essence reaver is going to overshadow it a lot.
